Use quantmod library to access Yahoo Finance data
```{r setup}
library(quantmod)

sp500 <- getSymbols("^GSPC", src = "yahoo", from = "1900-01-01", auto.assign = F)

sp500_df <- data.frame(
  date = index(sp500),
  coredata(sp500)
)

print(sp500_df)
print(colnames(sp500_df))

#to_csv(sp500_df, "sp500")
```
Write csv to data folder
```{r}
write.csv(sp500_df, "sp500_1928_2025.csv")
```
